section.heading: Administrative review.
section.text: A member in conditional retirement may challenge the imposition of penalties imposed by §§ 5-1054 and 5-1055 in an administrative proceeding before the District of Columbia Office of Employee Appeals, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2 [§ 2-501 et seq.].

annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: as added Mar. 11, 2015, D.C. Law 20-236, § 2(b), 62 DCR 485
